name: pnp-devproxy-ai-failure-resilience
title: Test AI app against LLM failure modes
shortDescription: Sample chat application that demonstrates how to test AI applications against common LLM failure modes using the LanguageModelFailurePlugin.
longDescription: Sample chat application that demonstrates how to test AI applications against common large language model (LLM) failure modes using Dev Proxy's LanguageModelFailurePlugin.
The app shows how to build resilient AI applications that gracefully handle unexpected or problematic LLM responses.
Features an interactive chat UI where Dev Proxy injects failure types like hallucinations, bias, circular reasoning, and more.
